Weapon.Name: Shadowstrike Dagger
Weapon.Description: A sleek dagger that seems to absorb the light around it, perfect for quick, silent takedowns.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a swift motion, you pierce the shadows, rendering your enemy momentarily speechless.

Weapon.Name: Echoes of the Past
Weapon.Description: A two-handed sword that whispers tales of ancient battles and fallen heroes when wielded.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The air shivers as you swing the sword, echoing the valor of past warriors.

Weapon.Name: Prismatic Staff
Weapon.Description: A staff that radiates a spectrum of light, rumored to be crafted from the core of a fallen star.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: A cascade of starlight assaults your foe, diminishing their resolve.
